participant_2.background:
I drive my car to work at an insurance firm.
my favorite french fries are from mcdonalds.
I had to say goodbye to my dog, Buddy.
I like to dye my hair bright colors, but I have to be careful because of my theater commitments.
I love having my dog around because he always makes me laugh.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing well, thanks! What are you up to today?
I'm just working on a project for my theater class. What about you?
I'm just hanging out with my dog, Buddy.
Aww, I love dogs! What breed is Buddy?
He's a golden retriever. He's the sweetest dog ever.
That's so cute! I used to have a golden retriever named Buddy, too. He was the best dog ever.
I'm sorry to hear that you had to say goodbye to him.
Yeah, it was really tough. But I know he's in a better place now.
I'm sure he is. What kind of theater class are you taking?
I'm taking a musical theater class. I'm really excited about it!
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've always wanted to take a musical theater class.
You should! It's a lot of work, but it's so much fun.
I might just do that! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! Have a great day!
